1.「はじめまして！ ここでは１０周年を記念して| 様々な特殊効果を かけているよ！:
Goo-d to meet you! We're celebrating the 10th|Anniversary with a goo-riety of neat effects!|Here's some examples...|
|Monsters will drop Commemorative Lotto Pieces,|and it'll be easier to encounter Metal-type|Slimes and rarified monsters!|
|When you use the Commemorative Magic, monsters|will sometimes drop those Commemorative Lotto|Pieces! How goo-reat!|
|The magic is divided per continent, and the|chance of a monster dropping one differs|depending on the location.|
||There are certain locations where the magic|has no effect. Please check the official site|for details.|
||Commemorative Magic is special, and can be|applied at the same time as other perfumes|and charms. Try using them together!|
|If you bring me enough pieces, you can|exchange them for 10th Anniversary Lotto|Tickets.|
|Please note that the effect to encounter Metal|Slimes easier is a special perfume, and you|can't use another perfume at the same time.|
|Also note that the effect to see rarified|monsters easier is a special charm, and you|can't use another charm at the same time.|
|The rarified monsters you'll encounter easier|will differ depending on the time. I'll let|you know which when I apply the charm.|
|Now, let's get started!

2.「ようこそ！ １０周年を記念して| 様々な特殊効果を かけているよ！| 何が お: Goo-d to see you! To celebrate the 10th|Anniversary, there's all kinds of special|effects! Which would you like?|<break>
